text: The Godfather Part III is a 1990 American crime drama movie directed and produced by Francis Ford Coppola, that stars Al Pacino and Diane Keaton. The movie is set in 1989 and 1990. It is the sequel to The Godfather and The Godfather Part II. It received mixed to positive reviews and did well at the box office. This movie was released December 25, 1990 in the United States. ==Media interest== The final scenes of the movie were filmed at the Teatro Massimo in Palermo, where the uncle of Francis Ford Coppola, the composer and conductor Anton Coppola, is shown conducting the opera, Cavalleria rusticana. == Other websites == * Category:1990 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American gangster movies Category:American sequel movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Movies set in Vatican City Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Movies directed by Francis Ford Coppola Category:Mafia movies Category:Movies about organized crime in the United States Category:Movies about atonement
title: The Godfather Part III
